projects.name: Load-Pulse: Load Testing Tool
projects.description: A CLI-based load testing tool that uses Raft. Follows microservice architecture with each service running in a contianer. Currently it only supports load-testing for HTTP but can be extended to support additional protocols and scaled using k8s instead of docker-compose.

projects.name: NodeGainsDB: Ligthweight In-Memory GraphDB
projects.description: A jacked Python graph DB with nodes and edges. Lift data with GymQL, spot connections, and flex your gains. Indexed for speed, stored in JSON, and terminal-run. Build your data muscles!

projects.name: Rubiks Cube Solver
projects.description: This project solves Rubik Cubes from a given state to goal state using BFS, IDDFS and IDA* search algorithms.

projects.name: Gradia

projects.name: GlowBridge
projects.description: GlowBridge enables users to scan product barcodes to quickly access detailed nutritional information including the product name and NutriScore, powered by Open Food Facts. The app also features nutritionist booking, allowing users to schedule consulations with experts for personalized dietary guidance.
